verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֤חַ׀ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician לְעֶ֥בֶד <WH5650> [Tle-'E-vedthe servant יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> le-Da-Vid [A Psalm] of David אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who דִּבֶּ֨ר׀ <WH1696> dib-Ber who spake לַיהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דִּ֭בְרֵי <WH1697> Div-rei the words הַשִּׁירָ֣ה <WH7892> hash-shi-Rah of this song הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> haz-Zot; in בְּי֤וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom in the day הִֽצִּיל־ <WH5337> hitz-tzil- delivered יְהוָ֘ה <WH3068> Yah-weh [that] the LORD אוֹת֥וֹ <WH853> o-To מִכַּ֥ף <WH3709> mik-Kaf him from the hand כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- of all אֹ֝יְבָ֗יו <WH341> 'o-ye-Vav, of all his enemies וּמִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> u-mi-Yad and from the hand שָׁאֽוּל׃ <WH7586> sha-'Ul. of Saul וַיֹּאמַ֡ר <WH559> vai-yo-Mar And he said אֶרְחָמְךָ֖ <WH7355> 'er-cha-me-Cha I will love יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh thee O LORD חִזְקִֽי׃ <WH2391> chiz-Ki. my strength

יְהוָ֤ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD סַֽלְעִ֥י <WH5553> sal-'I [is] my rock וּמְצוּדָתִ֗י <WH4686> u-me-tzu-da-Ti, and my fortress וּמְפַ֫לְטִ֥י <WH6403> u-me-Fal-Ti and my deliverer אֵלִ֣י <WH410> 'e-Li my God צ֭וּרִי <WH6697> Tzu-ri my strength אֶֽחֱסֶה־ <WH2620> 'e-che-seh- in whom I will trust בּ֑וֹ bo; מָֽגִנִּ֥י <WH4043> ma-gin-Ni my buckler וְקֶֽרֶן־ <WH7161> ve-ke-ren- and the horn יִ֝שְׁעִ֗י <WH3468> yish-'I, of my salvation מִשְׂגַּבִּֽי׃ <WH4869> mis-gab-Bi. [and] my high tower

מְ֭הֻלָּל <WH1984> Me-hul-lol [who is worthy] to be praised אֶקְרָ֣א <WH7121> 'ek-Ra I will call יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; upon the LORD וּמִן־ <WH4480> u-min- at אֹ֝יְבַ֗י <WH341> 'o-ye-Vai, from mine enemies אִוָּשֵֽׁעַ׃ <WH3467> 'iv-va-She-a'. so shall I be saved

אֲפָפ֥וּנִי <WH661> 'a-fa-Fu-ni compassed חֶבְלֵי־ <WH2256> chev-lei- The sorrows מָ֑וֶת <WH4194> Ma-vet; of death וְֽנַחֲלֵ֖י <WH5158> ve-na-cha-Lei me and the floods בְלִיַּ֣עַל <WH1100> ve-li-Ya-'al of ungodly men יְבַֽעֲתֽוּנִי׃ <WH1204> ye-Va-'a-Tu-ni. made me afraid

חֶבְלֵ֣י <WH2256> chev-Lei The sorrows שְׁא֣וֹל <WH7585> she-'ol of hell סְבָב֑וּנִי <WH5437> se-va-Vu-ni; compassed me about קִ֝דְּמ֗וּנִי <WH6923> kid-de-Mu-ni, prevented מ֣וֹקְשֵׁי <WH4170> Mok-shei the snares מָֽוֶת׃ <WH4194> Ma-vet. of death

בַּצַּר־ <WH6862> batz-tzar- In my distress לִ֤י׀ li אֶֽקְרָ֣א <WH7121> 'ek-Ra I called יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> Yah-weh upon the LORD וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- to אֱלֹהַ֪י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hai unto my God אֲשַׁ֫וֵּ֥עַ <WH7768> 'a-Shav-Ve-a' and cried יִשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> yish-Ma' he heard מֵהֵיכָל֣וֹ <WH1964> me-hei-cha-Lo out of his temple קוֹלִ֑י <WH6963> ko-Li; my voice וְ֝שַׁוְעָתִ֗י <WH7775> ve-shav-'a-Ti, and my cry לְפָנָ֤יו׀ <WH6440> le-fa-Nav before תָּב֬וֹא <WH935> ta-Vo came בְאָזְנָֽיו׃ <WH241> ve-'a-ze-Nav. him [even] into his ears

וַתִּגְעַ֬שׁ <WH1607> vat-tig-'Ash shook וַתִּרְעַ֨שׁ׀ <WH7493> vat-tir-'Ash and trembled הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, Then the earth וּמוֹסְדֵ֣י <WH4146> u-mos-Dei the foundations הָרִ֣ים <WH2022> ha-Rim also of the hills יִרְגָּ֑זוּ <WH7264> yir-Ga-zu; moved וַ֝יִּתְגָּֽעֲשׁ֗וּ <WH1607> vai-yit-ga-'a-Shu, and were shaken כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- because חָ֥רָה <WH2734> Cha-rah because he was wroth לֽוֹ׃ lo.

עָ֘לָ֤ה <WH5927> 'a-Lah There went up עָשָׁ֨ן׀ <WH6227> 'a-Shan a smoke בְּאַפּ֗וֹ <WH639> be-'ap-Po, out of his nostrils וְאֵשׁ־ <WH784> ve-'esh- and fire מִפִּ֥יו <WH6310> mip-Piv out of his mouth תֹּאכֵ֑ל <WH398> to-Chel; devoured גֶּ֝חָלִ֗ים <WH1513> ge-cha-Lim, coals בָּעֲר֥וּ <WH1197> ba-'a-Ru were kindled מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu. at

וַיֵּ֣ט <WH5186> vai-Yet He bowed שָׁ֭מַיִם <WH8064> ma-yim the heavens וַיֵּרַ֑ד <WH3381> vai-ye-Rad; also and came down וַ֝עֲרָפֶ֗ל <WH6205> va-'a-ra-Fel, and darkness תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat under רַגְלָֽיו׃ <WH7272> rag-Lav. [was] under his feet

וַיִּרְכַּ֣ב <WH7392> vai-yir-Kav And he rode עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon כְּ֭רוּב <WH3742> Ke-ruv upon a cherub וַיָּעֹ֑ף <WH5774> vai-ya-'Of; and did fly וַ֝יֵּ֗דֶא <WH1675> vai-Ye-de, yea he did fly עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon כַּנְפֵי־ <WH3671> kan-fei- upon the wings רֽוּחַ׃ <WH7307> Ru-ach. of the wind

יָ֤שֶׁת <WH7896> Ya-shet He made חֹ֨שֶׁךְ׀ <WH2822> Cho-shech darkness סִתְר֗וֹ <WH5643> sit-Ro, his secret place סְבִֽיבוֹתָ֥יו <WH5439> se-vi-vo-Tav round about סֻכָּת֑וֹ <WH5521> suk-ka-To; his pavilion חֶשְׁכַת־ <WH2824> chesh-chat- him [were] dark מַ֝֗יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim, waters עָבֵ֥י <WH5645> 'a-Vei [and] thick clouds שְׁחָקִֽים׃ <WH7834> she-cha-Kim. of the skies

מִנֹּ֗גַהּ <WH5051> min-No-gah, At the brightness נֶ֫גְדּ֥וֹ <WH5048> neg-Do before עָבָ֥יו <WH5645> 'a-Vav [that was] before him his thick clouds עָבְר֑וּ <WH5674> 'a-ve-Ru; passed בָּ֝רָ֗ד <WH1259> ba-Rad, hail וְגַֽחֲלֵי־ <WH1513> ve-ga-cha-lei- [stones] and coals אֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> 'Esh. of fire

וַיַּרְעֵ֬ם <WH7481> vai-yar-'Em also thundered בַּשָּׁמַ֨יִם׀ <WH8064> bash-sha-Ma-yim in the heavens יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD וְ֭עֶלְיוֹן <WH5945> Ve-'el-yon and the Highest יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> yit-Ten gave קֹל֑וֹ <WH6963> ko-Lo; his voice בָּ֝רָ֗ד <WH1259> ba-Rad, hail וְגַֽחֲלֵי־ <WH1513> ve-ga-cha-lei- [stones] and coals אֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> 'Esh. of fire

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> vai-yish-Lach Yea he sent out חִ֭צָּיו <WH2671> Chitz-tzav his arrows וַיְפִיצֵ֑ם <WH6327> vay-fi-Tzem; and scattered וּבְרָקִ֥ים <WH1300> u-ve-ra-Kim lightnings רָ֝ב <WH7232> rav them and he shot out וַיְהֻמֵּֽם׃ <WH2000> vay-hum-Mem. and discomfited

וַיֵּ֤רָא֨וּ׀ <WH7200> vai-Ye-ra-'U were seen אֲפִ֥יקֵי <WH650> 'a-Fi-kei Then the channels מַ֗יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim, of waters וַֽיִּגָּלוּ֮ <WH1540> vai-yig-ga-Lu were discovered מוֹסְד֪וֹת <WH4146> mos-Dot and the foundations תֵּ֫בֵ֥ל <WH8398> te-Vel of the world מִגַּעֲרָ֣תְךָ֣ <WH1606> mig-ga-'a-Ra-te-cha at thy rebuke יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; O LORD מִ֝נִּשְׁמַ֗ת <WH5397> min-nish-Mat, at the blast ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> Ru-ach of the breath אַפֶּֽךָ׃ <WH639> 'ap-Pe-cha. of thy nostrils

יִשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> yish-Lach He sent מִ֭מָּרוֹם <WH4791> Mi-ma-rom from above יִקָּחֵ֑נִי <WH3947> yik-ka-Che-ni; he took יַֽ֝מְשֵׁ֗נִי <WH4871> yam-She-ni, me he drew מִמַּ֥יִם <WH4325> mi-Ma-yim waters רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> rab-Bim. me out of many

יַצִּילֵ֗נִי <WH5337> yatz-tzi-Le-ni, He delivered מֵאֹיְבִ֥י <WH341> me-'o-ye-Vi enemy עָ֑ז <WH5794> 'Az; me from my strong וּ֝מִשֹּׂנְאַ֗י <WH8130> u-mis-so-ne-'Ai, and from them which hated כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אָמְצ֥וּ <WH553> 'a-me-Tzu me for they were too strong מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> mi-Men-ni. were too

יְקַדְּמ֥וּנִי <WH6923> ye-kad-de-Mu-ni They prevented בְיוֹם־ <WH3117> ve-yom- me in the day אֵידִ֑י <WH343> 'ei-Di; of my calamity וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> vay-hi- become יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh but the LORD לְמִשְׁעָ֣ן <WH4937> le-mish-'An was my stay לִֽי׃ Li.

וַיּוֹצִיאֵ֥נִי <WH3318> vai-yo-tzi-'E-ni He brought me forth לַמֶּרְחָ֑ב <WH4800> lam-mer-Chav; also into a large place יְ֝חַלְּצֵ֗נִי <WH2502> ye-chal-le-Tze-ni, he delivered כִּ֘י <WH3588> ki because חָ֥פֵֽץ <WH2654> Cha-fetz me because he delighted בִּֽי׃ Bi.

יִגְמְלֵ֣נִי <WH1580> yig-me-Le-ni rewarded יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD כְּצִדְקִ֑י <WH6664> ke-tzid-Ki; me according to my righteousness כְּבֹ֥ר <WH1252> ke-Vor according to the cleanness יָ֝דַ֗י <WH3027> ya-Dai, of my hands יָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> ya-Shiv hath he recompensed לִֽי׃ Li.

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki-Sha- for שָׁ֭מַרְתִּי <WH8104> mar-ti For I have kept דַּרְכֵ֣י <WH1870> dar-Chei the ways יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- not רָ֝שַׁ֗עְתִּי <WH7561> ra-Sha'-ti, and have not wickedly departed מֵאֱלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> me-'e-lo-Hai. from my God

כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for כָל־ <WH3605> chol for all מִשְׁפָּטָ֣יו <WH4941> mish-pa-Tav For all his judgments לְנֶגְדִּ֑י <WH5048> le-neg-Di; were before וְ֝חֻקֹּתָ֗יו <WH2708> ve-chuk-ko-Tav, his statutes לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- did not אָסִ֥יר <WH5493> 'a-Sir [were] before me and I did not put away מֶֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> Men-ni. at

וָאֱהִ֣י <WH1961> va-'e-Hi was also תָמִ֣ים <WH8549> ta-Mim I was also upright עִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> im-Mo; and I וָ֝אֶשְׁתַּמֵּ֗ר <WH8104> va-'esh-tam-Mer, before him and I kept מֵעֲוֹנִֽי׃ <WH5771> me-'a-vo-Ni. myself from mine iniquity

וַיָּֽשֶׁב־ <WH7725> vai-ya-shev- recompensed יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh Therefore hath the LORD לִ֣י li כְצִדְקִ֑י <WH6664> che-tzid-Ki; me according to my righteousness כְּבֹ֥ר <WH1252> ke-Vor according to the cleanness יָ֝דַ֗י <WH3027> ya-Dai, of my hands לְנֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> le-Ne-ged in עֵינָֽיו׃ <WH5869> 'ei-Nav. in his eyesight

עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- With חָסִ֥יד <WH2623> cha-Sid With the merciful תִּתְחַסָּ֑ד <WH2616> tit-chas-Sad; thou wilt shew thyself merciful עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with גְּבַ֥ר <WH1399> ge-Var man תָּ֝מִ֗ים <WH8549> ta-Mim, with an upright תִּתַּמָּֽם׃ <WH8552> tit-tam-Mam. thou wilt shew thyself upright

עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- With נָבָ֥ר <WH1305> na-Var With the pure תִּתְבָּרָ֑ר <WH1305> tit-ba-Rar; thou wilt shew thyself pure וְעִם־ <WH5973> ve-'im- and with עִ֝קֵּ֗שׁ <WH6141> 'ik-Kesh, and with the froward תִּתְפַּתָּֽל׃ <WH6617> tit-pat-Tal. thou wilt shew thyself froward

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אַ֭תָּה <WH859> 'At-tah you עַם־ <WH5971> 'am- people עָנִ֣י <WH6041> 'a-Ni the afflicted תוֹשִׁ֑יעַ <WH3467> to-Shi-a'; For thou wilt save וְעֵינַ֖יִם <WH5869> ve-'ei-Na-yim looks רָמ֣וֹת <WH7311> ra-Mot high תַּשְׁפִּֽיל׃ <WH8213> tash-Pil. but wilt bring down

הָאֵל֮ <WH410> ha-'El [As for] God תָּמִ֪ים <WH8549> ta-Mim [is] perfect דַּ֫רְכּ֥וֹ <WH1870> dar-Ko his way אִמְרַֽת־ <WH565> 'im-rat- the word יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD צְרוּפָ֑ה <WH6884> tze-ru-Fah; is tried מָגֵ֥ן <WH4043> ma-Gen he [is] a buckler ה֝֗וּא <WH1931> Hu, he לְכֹ֤ל׀ <WH3605> le-Chol to all הַחֹסִ֬ים <WH2620> ha-cho-Sim to all those that trust בּֽוֹ׃ bo.

מְלַמֵּ֣ד <WH3925> me-lam-Med He teacheth יָ֭דַי <WH3027> Ya-dai my hands לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> lam-mil-cha-Mah; to war וְֽנִחֲתָ֥ה <WH5181> ve-ni-cha-Tah is broken קֶֽשֶׁת־ <WH7198> ke-shet- so that a bow נְ֝חוּשָׁ֗ה <WH5154> ne-chu-Shah, of steel זְרוֹעֹתָֽי׃ <WH2220> ze-ro-'o-Tai. by mine arms
